'' Mr Eric Schmidt , speaking at the DLD media conference in Munich yesterday, said he expected to spend another 10 years at the company, after his surprise handover last week to co-founder Larry Page . I'm very personally excited about my next decade at Google, said Mr Eric Schmidt , who had previously said that the move was an effort to speed up decision-making. talkback No responses currently.
